Rápido!{nl}A fumaça está ficando mais densa!
É um desastre!{nl}Os demônios atacaram a nossa retaguarda!
Todos os nossos suprimentos estão lá!{nl}Se os demônios detruírem tudo, estaremos perdidos!{nl}
Por favor, você poderia nos ajudar com os demônios?
Eles atacaram quando não havia ninguém no ponto de encontro...{nl}Rápido!
Vamos, agora!
Não há duvida que o Sênior Henika estava de conluio com os demônios!{nl}
Haviam rumores dizendo que Ignas havia se aliado a eles...{nl}Pelo jeito, era tudo verdade.
Preciso avisar o Sênior Ramunas.
Estou indo agora!
Sênior Henika...{nl}Se Ignas realmente se aliou aso demônios, faria sentido.
Há dois círculos mágicos dentro da Astral Tower, que se ligam a esta área.{nl}Eu sei onde estes círculos estão instalados, duvido que Henika usaria eles.{nl}

Não so isso, nossos soldados patrulham a área constantemente,{nl}eles teriam visto e avisado imediatamente caso invadissem por eles.{nl}Isso tudo significa que Ignas deve ter feito um novo círculo mágico{nl}de teleporte, exclusivo para nos atacar.{nl}
Tendo atacado nossa retaguarda, o teleporte deve levar próximo de Waters 85...{nl}Poderia verificar a região?
Pegue este detector.{nl}Use isto para procurar possíveis círculos mágicos escondidos.{nl}
Se encontrar algo, não hesite em destruir imediatamente.{nl}Os círculos mágicos que vigiamos também devem ser destruídos.
Muito bem, corra para Waters 85.{nl}Provavelmente você encontrará algo próximo da entrada para cá.
Muito bem.{nl}Os outros círculos mágicos também foram destruídos.{nl}Eles não poderão fazer nenhum ataque surpresa agora.
E... tem mais uma coisa que preciso dizer a você.{nl}Ouvi isso há algum tempo do antigo chefe da torre,{nl}quando ainda estava dentro da Schaffenstar.{nl}
Ele não disse muitos detalhes sobre...{nl}Mas mencionaram que Lydia Schaffen manteve certas...{nl}Provisões ao redor da torre.{nl}
Um tipo de ferramenta para usar caso a Astral Tower enfrentasse{nl}alguma ameaça. Repito, não tenho detalhes, mas não há dúvidas{nl}de que poderia ser algo útil para nós.{nl}
Digo, veja o que está acontecendo!{nl}A torre foi completamente tomada por demônios após Medzio Diena!{nl}Como Revelador, acha que conseguiria achar estas provisões?
Muito obrigado por fazer isso por nós!{nl}Pelo que lembro, a busca deve compeçar no topo de Rombas Hill Road...{nl}
Meu palpute é que uma destas provisões poderia estar escondida lá.{nl}Talvez haja mais pistas em Rombas Hill Road.{nl}
Não deverá ser fácil recuperar estas provisões...{nl}Recomendo levar Lehon para ajudar você.
Sênior Ramunas disse isso?
If he mentioned Rombas Hill Road, there must be something there...{nl}Oh! I remember seeing an old tombstone at the end of the road, could that be a lead?
column3: 롬바스 오름길을 얘기하신 걸 봐선 그곳에 뭔가가 있나 보군요..{nl}아! 롬바스 오름길 끝에 오래된 비석이 하나 있는데 그 비석을 확인해 보는 게 어떻겠습니까?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: We should investigate all the possible clues one by one.
column3: 지금은 단서가 될만한 것부터 하나씩 확인해 봐야겠습니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: So the secret really was in the tombstone... It only revealed itself because you approached it.{nl}May I see the disk?
column3: 비석에 이런 비밀이 숨겨져 있었다니.. 계시자님이 접근하니까 비로소 그 비밀이 드러나는군요.{nl}그보다 그 원판을 볼 수 있을까요?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: This is only one half of the disk, I can't make out what it says...{nl}It only mentions the Senoves Altar.{nl}
column3: 원판이 반쪽짜리라 자세한 내용은 확인할 수 없었지만..{nl}세노베스 제단을 가리키는 글이 적혀있습니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: There could be something hidden there!
column3: 세노베스 제단에 뭔가가 숨겨져 있을지도 모르겠군요!

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: This is the other half of the disk!{nl}To think something like this was hidden in the altar...{nl}
column3: 원판의 나머지 반쪽을 획득했군요!{nl}세노베스 제단에 이런 장치들이 마련돼 있을줄은..{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Let me have a look at the disk.
column3: 잠시 원판을 붙여서 내용을 확인해 볼게요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The disk says something is waiting at the Patogus Shelter.{nl}I don't know what exactly is waiting there... but we should find out! Let's go.
column3: 내용을 확인해 보니 파토구스 쉼터에서 기다리겠다는 내용이 담겨있군요.{nl}뭘 기다린다는 건지 모르겠지만.. 일단 파토구스 쉼터로 이동해보죠!

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: What is a little girl doing in a dangerous place like this...?{nl}And... what was she talking about?
column3: 이런 위험한 곳을 돌아다니다니..{nl}그보다.. 방금 전 소녀가 얘기한 게 뭘 뜻하는 걸까요?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I think she was talking about an altar and the disk...{nl}
column3: 그 소녀가 제단과 원판에 대한 얘기를 한 것 같은데..{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Oh! There's an altar at the shelter. Should we try and place the disk there?
column3: 아! 쉼터에 제단이 하나 있는데 그 제단 위에 원판을 올려보는 게 어떻습니까?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Let's go!
column3: 그럼 어서 이동하죠!

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: This means Lydia Schaffen's provisions were all a plan of Goddess Laima...
column3: 리디아 샤펜님의 안배가 라이마 여신님의 뜻이였다니..

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: These Orbs could be the answer to our problems.{nl}
column3: 아마도 그 보주가 지금의 상황을 타개할 결정적인 물건 같습니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Go back to Sênior Ramunas. Tell him about what happened and show him the Orbs.{nl}I'll clear the shelter first and join you later.
column3: 집결지로 돌아가 라무나스 장로님에게 지금까지의 일들을 얘기하고 그 보주를 보여주세요.{nl}전 이 쉼터 주변에 있는 마족을 처치하고 난 후에 움직이겠습니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Go! You must tell Sênior Ramunas about what we found!
column3: 어서 가서 이 일을 라무나스 장로님에게 알려드리세요!

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Is this true?{nl}Schaffen's provisions were a plan of Goddess Laima...{nl}
column3: 그게 사실인가?{nl}리디아 샤펜님의 안배가 라이마 여신님의 뜻이라면..{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: And these Orbs, so full of divine energy...{nl}The commander arrived not long ago, he should know about this.
column3: 게다가 이런 신성한 힘을 가진 보주라니..{nl}일단 이곳에 총사령관이 내려왔으니 그와 얘기해 보는 게 좋을 듯하네.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Did you speak with Sênior Ramunas?
column3: 아직 라무나스 장로님과 대화하지 않으신 건가요?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: We finally meet. I heard all about you.{nl}My name's Byle.
column3: 처음 뵙는군요. 얘기는 익히 들었습니다.{nl}바일이라고 합니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Go ahead and speak to the commander.
column3: 어서 총사령관과 얘기해보게.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Are you saying this Orb can detect demons disguised as humans?{nl}
column3: 이 보주로 인간으로 위장한 마족을 구별해 낼 수 있다는 말입니까?{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I find it hard to believe there are actual demons on Ignas' side...{nl}But looking at what's happened so far, I do see the possibility.{nl}
column3: 이그나스 측 지휘관 중에 마족이 섞여 있다는 얘기는 믿기 힘들지만..{nl}지금까지의 정황상 그 얘기가 가능성 있는 얘기로 들리는군요.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The members siding with Ignas now will certainly change their minds if they find out.{nl}Imagine finding out the leaders of your camp were demons all along.{nl}
column3: 이그나스 측 단원들도 이 사실을 알게 된다면 생각이 바뀔지도 모릅니다.{nl}자신들의 지휘관이 마족이었다는 사실을 알게 되면 굉장히 혼란스러워 질 테죠.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I have an idea.{nl}We plant these Orbs near the Raikinas Lowlands.{nl}
column3: 좋은 생각이 났습니다.{nl}라이키나스 저지대 근처에 그 보주를 매설하는 겁니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Then, we lure the demons disguised as humans out to the field...{nl}And we wait for the Orbs to react.{nl}
column3: 인간으로 위장한 그 마족 지휘관을 매설지역으로 유인해 낸다면..{nl}매설되어 있던 보주가 그 마족 지휘관에게 반응할 겁니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: They might figure out we're up to something if I do it...{nl}If it's not asking too much, would you plant the Orbs yourself?
column3: 제가 움직이면 저들이 눈치챌지도 모르니..{nl}계시자님께 보주 매설을 부탁드려도 되겠습니까?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Planting the Orbs in three different locations should be enough.
column3: 적당히 세 군데 지역에 보주를 매설하면 되겠군요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Are the Orbs planted?
column3: 아직 매설은 안 되었나요?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Good!
column3: 모두 매설하셨군요!

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Now to lure out Ignas' demon commanders.
column3: 그럼 그 지휘관을 유인하기 위해 움직이죠!

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: It's a success!{nl}You've done a great job, Revelator.
column3: 성공적이었습니다!{nl}계시자님께서 정말 큰 일을 해내셨습니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: It's time to move on to the next area and take back the Astral Tower.{nl}Would you join me?
column3: 이제 다음 수역으로 이동해 별의 탑을 탈환하기 위해 움직여야겠습니다.{nl}계시자님께서도 같이 움직이시겠습니까?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The water point of this region is also broken.{nl}Fortunately I think we can get it to work again with the documents you gave me.{nl}
column3: 이곳 수역의 수반도 정상적으로 작동되지 않는다네.{nl}다행히도 자네가 건네준 관리문서를 보니 수반을 정상적으로 가동할 수 있겠어.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I'm afraid we have no Magic Stones to operate the controllers.{nl}Though remember hearing they used to load them with stones carrying the energy of the lake in the past.{nl}
column3: 그런데 수반 제어에 필요한 마법석들이 없어서 고민일세.{nl}지금은 마법석을 이용하지만, 과거에는 호수의 기운이 깃든 돌들을 가공해서 수반시설을 가동했다고 들었네.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: And the documents only say that the controllers need a means for the magic reaction...{nl}Maybe it doesn't have to be Magic Stones!{nl}
column3: 관리문서에는 마법적인 반응을 일으키는 매개체를 사용하라고 적혀있으니..{nl}꼭 마법석이 아니어도 된다는 얘기겠지!{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Besides, we have no time to waste. Some lake energy stones will have to do.{nl}
column3: 시간이 없는 만큼 호수의 기운이 깃든 돌들을 마법석 대용으로 써야겠네.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The Atskiras Lot has a lot of stones. Would you go and collect some for me?
column3: 앳스키라스 공터에 그 돌들이 많으니 자네가 대신 그 돌들을 수집해 줄 수 있겠나?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I would go with you, but if I do the assembly area will have no one to look after it.{nl}I'm sorry. Good luck.
column3: 나도 돕고 싶지만 내가 빠지면 집결지 내 병사들을 지휘할 사람이 없네.{nl}그럼 부탁함세.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Did you look for the stones at the Lot?
column3: 공터의 돌들은 확인해 봤나?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: This seems enough.
column3: 그 정도 양이면 충분할 것 같군.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: As you know from working on the other water points, you need to place the stones in a certain number and a certain order.{nl}
column3: 이전 수역에서도 수반을 가동해서 알겠지만..{nl}제어장치 위에 돌들을 순서와 개수에 맞춰서 올려놔야 하네.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: For our water point...{nl}It says 1, 2 and 3 stones per controller, placed clockwise in order.{nl}
column3: 이 수역에 있는 수반을 가동하기 위해선..{nl}올려놓는 돌을 각각 1개, 2개, 3개씩 시계방향 순서대로 올려놔야 한다고 쓰여있군.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Since you're already familiar with the water points, will you go and get ours restarted?
column3: 자네도 수반을 한번 작동시켜서 방식을 알고 있을 테니..{nl}이 곳 수역에 있는 수반도 자네가 가동해 줄 수 있겠나?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Oh, and about the magic circles for the Water Facility.{nl}The page in the document was ripped, so I couldn't tell for sure...{nl}
column3: 아.. 그리고 이곳 수역에 있는 수반시설의 보호마법진을 활성화하는 방법 말일세.{nl}문서는 찢겨 있어서 자세히 확인하진 못했지만..{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: But if I remember correctly, you need to transform all the magic circles around the water point.{nl}And there's a type of preventive device... a trap, if you will.{nl}
column3: 내 기억하기로는 수반 주변의 마법진들을 모두 변형시켜야 하는 걸로 알고 있네.{nl}방해 장치도 등장한다는 것 같은데..{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: If you see anything that looks like that, just try to avoid it.
column3: 방해 장치로 보이는 게 나타나면 그걸 피해서 진행해보게.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Is the water point working now?{nl}Remember the right order and number of stones.
column3: 수반은 정상적으로 가동했는가?{nl}돌을 올려놓는 순서와 개수를 잘 생각해보게.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The water point is working now?{nl}That's good to hear, thank you.
column3: 수반을 정상적으로 가동시켰단 말인가?{nl}정말 고맙네.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The members on Ignas' camp are starting to doubt him after finding out they were siding with demons.{nl}
column3: 자신이 따르던 자가 마족이었단 사실을 알게 되자 이그나스 측 단원들이 동요하고 있어요.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: If we can convince them, they'll be a great help in taking back the Astral Tower.{nl}Would you give us a hand?
column3: 저들을 모두 회유한다면 별의 탑을 탈환하는 데 큰 힘이 될 겁니다.{nl}계시자님께 회유하는 일을 부탁드려도 될까요?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I do believe it will be more effective if you're the one who talks to them.{nl}Good luck.
column3: 저항군 측에서 나서는 것보다 계시자님이 나서는 게 더 효과적일 거에요.{nl}그럼 부탁드리겠습니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Imagine how much stronger we'll be if we have all the members on our side.
column3: 동요하는 단원들을 모두 회유하게 된다면 사실상 전력이 배가 되는 거죠.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: You persuaded all the members.{nl}Thank you.
column3: 모두 회유하셨나 보군요!{nl}감사합니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: There are too many demons around, we can barely move.{nl}Would you clear the area for us?
column3: 주변에 마족들이 너무 많아 저항군들이 움직이기가 쉽지 않네요.{nl}주변 마족들을 처치해주실 수 있나요?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I'll be here resting. Thank you.
column3: 제가 쉬고 있는 동안 부탁드립니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Did you clear some of the demons nearby?
column3: 주변 마족들을 모두 처치하셨나요?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: There are a lot fewer demons now.{nl}Thank you.
column3: 마족들의 수가 눈에 띄게 줄어들었군요.{nl}감사합니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I heard a lot about you, Revelator.{nl}Commander Byle has just arrived, too. It seems the demon that's occupying the region is none other than Pbeta.{nl}
column3: 계시자님의 얘기는 많이 들어서 알고 있습니다.{nl}마침 바일님이 도착하셔서 얘기하시길, 이 수역에 있는 상급 마족이 프베타라고 하더군요.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Oh, I almost forgot. My name is Morvio, I'm a student of the Ranger Master.{nl}She asked me to come and help the resistance soldiers, so here I am.{nl}
column3: 아, 제 소개가 늦었군요. 전 레인저 마스터님의 제자 모르비오라고 합니다.{nl}마스터님의 부탁으로 저항군들을 도와주기 위해 이렇게 오게 되었습니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: You may not know this, but the situation is very, very serious.{nl}
column3: 모르시겠지만, 이곳은 지금 심각한 상황입니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Pbeta has planted mind-controlling stones across the region to command the monsters.{nl}Apparently the strong energy of the stones is enough to completely hypnotize them.{nl}
column3: 프베타가 수역 내 몬스터들을 조종하는 제어 마법석들을 수역 이곳저곳에 만들어 두었더군요.{nl}제어 마법석에서 흘러나오는 강력한 기운들이 몬스터들을 강제적으로 조종하는 듯합니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: You and Commander Byle should discuss what to do.
column3: 일단 앞으로 어떻게 할 건지 바일님과 얘기를 나누시는 게 좋을 것 같습니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I'll be waiting.
column3: 그럼 기다리고 있겠습니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Looks like you already met Morvio.{nl}Oort is also here to help the resistance soldiers.{nl}
column3: 앞에 계신 모르비오님과 먼저 인사를 나누셨나 보군요.{nl}모르비오님과 옆에 계신 오르트님은 저희 저항군을 돕기 위해 오신 분들입니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: They came to me not long ago and I sent them here to scout the area.{nl}There had been sightings of a high-rank demon nearby, so I thought we should investigate.{nl}
column3: 얼마 전, 두 분이 저희를 돕기 위해 찾아왔을 때 제가 이곳을 정찰해달라고 부탁드렸습니다.{nl}이곳 수역에서 상급 마족을 목격했다는 제보가 들어왔기 때문에 어렵게 부탁을 드렸죠.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The demon is most likely Pbeta, who was rumored to have collided with Ignas.{nl}
column3: 아무래도 이 수역에 있는 상급 마족이 이그나스와 결탁했다는 프베타라는 마족일 겁니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: As you know, we're a little short-handed...{nl}Not just to take over the Astral Tower, but to defeat Pbeta most of all.{nl}
column3: 아시다시피 별의 탑을 탈환하기 위해선 저항군의 수가 무엇보다 중요한데..{nl}프베타를 처치하기 위해 저항군의 인원을 나누기가 힘드네요.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Please, help the Master's students defeat Pbeta.
column3: 계시자님께서 여기 도와주러 오신 마스터 제자분들과 함께 프베타를 처치해 주십시오.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Have you talked to Commander Byle yet?
column3: 바일님과 얘기를 아직 안 하셨습니까?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: We can't refuse an order from Commander Byle.{nl}Let's go.
column3: 바일님께서 그리 말씀하시니 거절할 수 없지요.{nl}한번 해 보죠.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I wonder if my request wasn't too much for you and the students.
column3: 계시자님과 마스터 제자분들에게 무리한 부탁이 아닌가 싶군요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: If we're going to get to Pbeta, first we need to destroy his mind-controlling Magic Stones.{nl}That will at least keep the monsters away from us.{nl}
column3: 프베타를 처치하기에 앞서 제어 마법석들을 파괴해야 합니다.{nl}제어 마법석만 파괴한다면 수역 내 몬스터들은 우릴 건드리지 않을 겁니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Would you start by doing that?
column3: 계시자님께서 직접 제어 마법석을 파괴해 주시겠습니까?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Before destroying the stones, use this Absorbing Stone to soak up the evil energy of Pbeta's Magic Stones.{nl}
column3: 제어 마법석을 파괴하기 전에 이 흡수석으로 제어 마법석의 사악한 기운을 흡수해 주세요.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: There's no telling how Pbeta's stones will react if you try to destroy them while the energy is still flowing...{nl}
column3: 사악한 기운이 흐르는 동안에 제어 마법석을 파괴하려 한다면..{nl}어떤 반응이 나올지 모르니깐요.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I wish I could come along, but I'm afraid the monsters will tell we're up to something if we go together...{nl}Good luck.
column3: 계시자님과 같이 움직이고 싶지만 몬스터들이 눈치챌지도 모르니..{nl}부탁드립니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The energy of Pbeta's Magic Stones is spreading throughout the entire region.{nl}I never felt anything like this.
column3: 제어 마법석에서 흘러나오는 사악한 기운이 이 수역 전체를 휘감고 있어요.{nl}이렇게 사악한 기운은 처음 느껴봅니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: You destroyed the Magic Stones!{nl}But now... the energy coming from the Absorbing Stone is creeping me out.{nl}
column3: 제어 마법석을 모두 파괴하셨군요!{nl}그보다.. 이 흡수석에 들어있는 기운들은 정말 소름 끼치는군요.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I'll think of a way to dispose of the energy.
column3: 일단 이 흡수석은 제가 특수하게 용해하겠습니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Did you feel the energy that was spreading around here?{nl}The evil energy you took with that Absorbing Stone!{nl}
column3: 이 수역에 퍼져있는 사악한 기운을 혹시 자네도 느꼈는가?{nl}자네가 조금 전 흡수석을 통해 흡수했던 그 사악한 기운 말일세!{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: You know, they keep very dangerous things deep inside the Astral Tower.{nl}Including the essence of Ziburynas, the demon lord who was defeated by Lydia Schaffen.{nl}
column3: 별의 탑에서는 대륙에 나와서는 안 될 위험한 물건들을 탑 깊숙한 곳에 보관하고 있다네.{nl}특히 과거 리디아 샤펜님이 죽인 마왕 지부리나스의 정수도 보관되어 있지.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I saw it once, when I was working inside the Tower.{nl}I'll never forget the awful energy I felt then.{nl}
column3: 탑의 장로에 있을 때 그 정수를 한 번 본 적이 있어.{nl}그때 느꼈던 그 사악한 기운은 지금도 잊혀지지 않는다네.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: But now... I can feel it again! It's the same energy, spreading all over the region!{nl}What if... Ignas took the essence of Ziburynas and gave it to Pbeta?{nl}
column3: 그런데 이 수역에 퍼져있는 사악한 기운이 그 정수에서 흘러나오던 기운과 똑같은 기운을 가지고 있네!{nl}아무래도.. 이그나스가 탑에 보관되어 있던 지부리나스의 정수를 프베타에게 넘겨준 것 같군.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: You might have heard that Lydia Schaffen killed Ziburynas with a powerful arrow called the Flechette.{nl}Maybe the Fletcher Master can help us find a way to fight Ziburynas' essence.{nl}
column3: 과거 리디아 샤펜님이 플레세트라는 강력한 화살로 마왕 지부리나스를 처치했다고 하지.{nl}플레처 마스터 또한 지부리나스의 정수를 가진 마족을 처치할 방안을 알고 있을지도 모르네.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: If that's alright with you, would you pay a visit to the Fletcher Master?
column3: 괜찮다면, 자네가 플레처 마스터를 찾아가 그 방안이 있는지 확인해 줄 수 있겠나?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: He should be at the Goddess' Ancient Garden.{nl}
column3: 플레처 마스터는 여신의 옛뜰에 있을걸세.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Oh, and it seems he sent one of his students over to help, but they're still nowhere to be seen.{nl}I wonder if something happened... Do check with the Fletcher Master.{nl}{nl}
column3: 아, 그리고 플레처 마스터가 제자를 보내주기로 했는데 아직 도착하지 않았더군.{nl}무슨일이 생긴 것인지.. 제자를 보냈는지도 플레처 마스터에게 같이 확인해 주게.{nl}{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The essence of Ziburynas... This is very serious.
column3: 지부리나스의 정수라.. 그거 심각한 일이군.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Did you visit the Fletcher Master yet?
column3: 아직 플레처 마스터를 찾아가지 않았는가?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Yes, Lydia Schaffen killed Ziburynas a long time go.{nl}But do you know how she did it? It was all thanks to the Flechette, a mighty arrow created by my ancestors.{nl}
column3: 오래전 리디아 샤펜이 마왕 지부리나스를 처치했다고 전해지지.{nl}그 마왕 지부리나스를 처치할 때 내 선조께서 만드신 플레세트라는 강력한 화살을 사용한 사실을 알고 계시오?{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I have yet to find it but... I did my research on it.{nl}I found a way to produce an arrow that's almost as powerful as the original Flechette.{nl}
column3: 그 플레세트를 아직 찾아내진 못했지만.. 나름 플레세트를 고증 연구했소.{nl}그 힘에는 미치지 못해도 그에 못지않은 강력한 화살 제조법을 만드는 데 성공했지.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I can hand you the instructions. Please deliver them to my student.
column3: 내가 그 제조법을 건네줄 테니 자네가 가서 내 제자에게 전해 주시지 않겠소?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: It's already been a few days since he left...{nl}If you go now, he should be there when you arrive.{nl}
column3: 제자는 이미 며칠 전에 출발했소.{nl}아마 제자와 서로 길이 엇갈린 것 같으니 지금 가면 도착해 있을 거요.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: And make sure you keep an eye on that Earth Essence. My student didn't take any, so it's very important that you don't lose it.{nl}
column3: 아, 그리고 같이 건네준 그 대지의 정수는 제자가 가져간 물품에 없으니 잃어버리면 안 되오.{nl}화살 제조에 꼭 필요한 재료이기도 하고, 구하기도 쉽지 않은 물건이니 잘 확인해가면서 가시오.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Those are some great things he handed you.{nl}And his student is here, too.{nl}
column3: 플레처 마스터가 아주 중요한 물건을 전해주었구먼.{nl}그렇지 않아도 마침 플레처 마스터의 제자가 도착해 있네.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Go and give him the things.
column3: 그에게 이 물품들을 전달해주게.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Did you give everything to the Fletcher Master's student yet?
column3: 아직 전달하지 않은 거요?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The Master gave these to you?
column3: 마스터님께서 전해주셨다고요?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The student arrived just after you left.{nl}Looks like you just went different ways.
column3: 자네가 플레처 마스터를 만나러 가고 나서 바로 도착했더군.{nl}서로 길이 엇갈린 듯하네.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: It looks like the situation is serious, from these instructions.{nl}I heard a big demon was in the area.{nl}
column3: 마스터님께서 굉장한 제조법을 만드신 것 같군요.{nl}이 곳 수역에 프베타라는 상급 마족이 있다는 얘길 들었습니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: An arrow like this would be extremely helpful to face a demon like Pbeta...{nl}But I'm missing the materials for the arrowhead.{nl}
column3: 만약 이 화살을 제작하게 되면 프베타를 상대할 때 정말 유용할 텐데..{nl}이 화살 제조법에 나와 있는 재료 중에 화살촉에 쓰일 재료가 제 수중에 없습니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I did notice some natural Obsidian on the way to Waters 86.{nl}If we're lucky, they could contain some magic...{nl}
column3: 마침 86수역으로 가는 길 근처에 천연 흑요석이 많이 보이더군요.{nl}그 흑요석들이 마력을 가지고 있는 것 같던데..{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I think I can make a good arrowhead with some of that Obsidian.{nl}If it's not asking too much, would you collect some for me?
column3: 그 흑요석들을 잘 다듬으면 아주 강력한 화살촉을 만들 수 있을 것 같습니다.{nl}계시자님께서 흑요석들을 구해다 주실 수 있으신가요?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I'll be preparing the tools to process the mineral meanwhile.{nl}Thank you.{nl}
column3: 저도 돕고 싶지만, 흑요석을 녹일 준비를 해야되서요.{nl}그럼 부탁드릴게요.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Did you bring the Obsidian?
column3: 흑요석은 구해 오셨나요?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: This is enough.{nl}Thank you.
column3: 이정도 양이면 충분해요.{nl}감사합니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Come to think of it, I'm also short on materials for the fletching.{nl}But I believe there are Humming Dukes nearby...{nl}
column3: 생각해보니 화살 깃에 쓰일 재료도 부족하군요.{nl}마침 주변에 허밍 듀크가 많이 있던데..{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Humming Duke feathers are flexible but durable. They'll make for good fletching materials.{nl}Would you collect some for me?
column3: 허밍 듀크의 깃털은 굉장히 질기고 유연해서 화살 깃에 매우 유용하게 쓰여요.{nl}계시자님이 허밍 듀크의 깃털을 구해다 주실 수 있으신가요?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Thank you.{nl}I'll go ahead and make the arrowhead first.
column3: 감사합니다.{nl}전 여기서 화살촉을 마저 제작하고 있을게요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Please make sure the feathers don't get damaged, otherwise I can't use them.
column3: 화살 깃으로 써야 하니 깃털은 상하지 않게 구해다 주세요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: That's a lot of feathers.{nl}I'll have to throw away some of the long white ones, but the rest look good enough to use for the fletching.{nl}
column3: 많이도 구해 오셨네요.{nl}깃털이 휜 거 몇 개 빼고는 나머지들의 상태가 좋으니 화살 깃으로 쓰기에 충분해요.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Just wait for a moment while I craft the arrow.
column3: 그럼 화살을 제작하는 동안 기다려 주세요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Hunter Oort
column3: 헌터 오르트

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Sorry I didn't introduce myself earlier. I'm Oort.{nl}My Master sent me out here to help the resistance soldiers...{nl}
column3: 소개가 늦었군요. 전 오르트라고 합니다.{nl}마스터의 부탁으로 저항군을 돕기 위해 이곳에 와 있는데..{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: But it looks like we're going to have to face Pbeta now. Is that right?{nl}Won't we have to deal with his subordinates as well? I think we should prepare for that.{nl}
column3: 상황을 보니 곧 프베타를 처치하기 위해 움직이실 것 같네요.{nl}프베타의 부하들도 대비해야 할 텐데 그 준비를 아직 안하신 것 같아요.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: There's a highly poisonous plant growing near the old garden called Ziburyte.{nl}Would you bring me some?{nl}
column3: 무너진 옛 정원 터에 지부리트라는 독성이 아주 강한 풀이 자라더군요.{nl}계시자님이 그 지부리트 풀을 구해다 주실 수 있으신가요?{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I can use the Ziburyte to make a series of traps for Pbeta's subordinates.
column3: 구해 오신다면 제가 그 풀을 이용해 프베타의 부하들을 대비할 함정을 만들어 드리죠.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I'll stay here and prepare the other tools for the traps.{nl}Just be careful when collecting the Ziburyte. It's very poisonous.
column3: 전 여기서 함정을 만들 준비를 하고 있을게요.{nl}지부리트 풀은 독성이 강하니 채집할 때 주의하시고요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Where's the Ziburyte?{nl}Please, hurry.
column3: 아직 구해오지 않으셨군요.{nl}서둘러야 할 것 같아요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: You're back!{nl}Hold on a moment.
column3: 구해오셨군요!{nl}잠시 기다리세요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The traps are ready.{nl}Please set them up on the way to Pbeta's location.{nl}
column3: 함정을 모두 만들었어요.{nl}프베타가 위치한 장소 길목에 이 함정을 설치하세요.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The poison in these traps is very strong. It should be enough to hit even very large monsters.
column3: 강한 독성을 가지고 있으니 어지간한 몬스터라도 사경을 헤맬 겁니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Oh, it looks like Voleta is done with the arrows.{nl}You can take Morvio and Voleta, then.
column3: 아, 볼레타님도 화살을 모두 제작하신 것 같아요.{nl}모르비오님, 볼레타 님과 동행해서 움직이시면 될 것 같군요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: After you set up the traps, make sure to avoid the area.{nl}The poison will start spreading immediately if one of them is triggered.
column3: 함정을 설치하면 그 주변에 서 있지 마세요.{nl}함정이 발동되면 독이 퍼지니 주의하셔야 합니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: All the traps are in place now?
column3: 함정을 모두 설치하셨군요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Alright, let's move.{nl}We should hurry, in case Pbeta tries anything.
column3: 어서 움직이죠.{nl}프베타가 움직일지도 모르니 서둘러야 합니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Be careful not to let Pbeta find out we're after him.
column3: 프베타가 눈치채지 못하게 조심스럽게 움직여요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Revelator, have you made your decision?{nl}Whatever you think is best, we'll follow.
column3: 계시자님, 결정을 내리셨나요?{nl}계시자님이 어떤 결정을 내리셔도 그 결정에 따르도록 할게요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Understood.{nl}I'll fire the arrow as soon I see Pbeta.{nl}
column3: 알겠습니다.{nl}그럼 프베타를 보자마자 바로 화살을 쏘겠습니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Morvio is going to stay and look out for Pbeta's subordinates.{nl}Let's go, then.
column3: 모르비오님은 이 곳에서 프베타의 부하들이 몰려오는지 지켜본다고 하시니..{nl}저희끼리 움직이죠.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I'm sorry. Pbeta escaped, there was nothing we could do.{nl}
column3: 죄송합니다. 프베타가 기습적으로 도망치는 바람에 놓치고 말았네요.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Voleta was hurt trying to stop Pbeta.{nl}We should go first and reunite later.{nl}
column3: 볼레타님은 프베타를 막아내는 도중에 중상을 입은 상태입니다.{nl}몸이 회복되는 대로 합류하겠다고 하셨으니 저희끼리라도 움직여야 할 것 같습니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Now, I think Pbeta stepped on one of the traps when he escaped.{nl}That means it will be easier to follow him.{nl}
column3: 길목에 설치해 두었던 함정을 프베타가 밟은 것 같더군요.{nl}이렇게 되면 프베타를 추적하기 더욱 쉬워집니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: We need to track him down.
column3: 그럼 바로 프베타를 추적하러 움직이죠.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Let's go back to the traps and look for clues!
column3: 함정을 설치했던 지점으로 가서 흔적을 찾아보죠!

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The trail ends here.{nl}There are no more traces.
column3: 이게 마지막 흔적입니다.{nl}더 이상의 흔적은 보이질 않아요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I think he escaped to the Astral Tower.{nl}Ignas' men will be all over the entrance to the Tower... it won't be easy.{nl}
column3: 프베타는 별의 탑 입구까지 도망친 것 같습니다.{nl}별의 탑 입구는 이그나스 측에서 쉽게 관측할 수 있는 곳이라.. 고민이군요. {nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Revelator, would you go after Pbeta?{nl}I'm going to call for help.
column3: 계시자님께서 먼저 프베타를 상대해 주시겠습니까?{nl}전 그동안 돌아가서 다른 사람들을 불러오겠습니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Good luck.
column3: 그럼 부탁드립니다!

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Thank you for everything.{nl}
column3: 정말 고생 많으셨습니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: This is as far as we can come with you, Revelator.{nl}I'm afraid our purpose here doesn't relate to the Astral Tower, there's nothing more we can do to help.{nl}
column3: 저와 다른 마스터 제자분들이 도와드릴 수 있는 건 여기까지입니다.{nl}이 이상으로는 저희에게 별의 탑에 직접 관여할 명분이 없어 도와드릴 수 없습니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Commander Byle also said that...{nl}You have something to do in the Astral Tower.{nl}
column3: 바일님도 사전에 그러한 얘기를 하셨으니..{nl}듣기로 계시자님도 별의 탑에서 해야 할 일이 있다고 들었습니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I don't know what you'll be doing in there, but be careful.{nl}The other students and I are going to stay here for a while.{nl}
column3: 별의 탑에서 무슨 일이 일어나고 있는지 모르지만 조심하세요.{nl}저와 다른 마스터 제자분들은 한동안 이 곳에 남아 있을 겁니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: There are still demons roaming around in the area, we'll go ahead and get rid of them.{nl}I'll see you another time.{nl}
column3: 다른 수역에도 아직 마족들이 많이 남아있으니 그 마족들을 마저 처치해야죠.{nl}그럼 전 다른 마스터 제자분들에게 돌아가 보도록 하겠습니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: May the goddess protect you, Revelator.
column3: 부디 계시자님께 여신님의 가호가 있길 바랍니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Revelator, may I ask you for a favor?{nl}
column3: 계시자님 부탁하나만 드려도 되겠습니까?{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I'm out of food to give to Inas.{nl}Would you hunt some Humming Dukes for me? I could really use some meat.
column3: 이나스에게 줄 먹이가 모두 떨어져서 난처한 상황입니다.{nl}주변에 있는 허밍 듀크에게서 고기를 수집해 주실 수 있으신가요?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I would hunt them myself but...{nl}Inas is just too hungry. He's refusing to cooperate.{nl}
column3: 제가 직접 움직이고 싶은데..{nl}먹이가 동이 나자 이나스가 너무 사나워져서 움직일 수가 없네요.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I'll be very grateful.
column3: 부탁드립니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Please hurry.
column3: 서둘러 주세요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Thank you.{nl}I should hurry and feed Inas now.
column3: 정말 감사합니다.{nl}이나스에게 어서 고기를 먹여야겠어요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I just realized I'm out of water, too.{nl}I think I saw some Pasto water plants nearby.{nl}
column3: 그러고 보니 식수가 떨어진 걸 잊고 있었네요.{nl}수역 근처에 파스토 수초가 많은 걸 봤습니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Pasto plants are known to act as purifiers; I think I can use them to filter some lake water.{nl}Would you collect some water plants for me?
column3: 파스토 수초는 뛰어난 정화기능을 가지고 있어 호수의 물을 식수로 이용할 수 있어요.{nl}계시자님께서 파스토 수초를 구해다 주실 수 있으신가요?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Pasto plants grow underwater, however, so they're hard to spot with the naked eye.{nl}But check the surface of the water for bubbles, you should find them there.{nl}
column3: 파스토 수초는 물 밑에서 자라기 때문에 육안으로 확인하는 게 쉽지 않아요.{nl}물가에 공기 방울이 일어나는 곳을 확인해 보세요.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Inas is still a little sensitive, I'm going to have to stay with him for a while.{nl}Thanks for the help.
column3: 저는 신경이 예민해진 이나스가 무슨 사고를 칠지 몰라서 곁에 있어야 할 것 같아요.{nl}부탁드릴게요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Did you bring the plants?{nl}I'm getting thirsty already.
column3: 아직 구해오지 않으셨나요?{nl}목이 좀 마르네요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Thank you!{nl}This should work for a while.
column3: 감사합니다!{nl}이 정도 양이면 당분간 식수 걱정은 없겠군요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: It took me years, but thanks to you I finally got hold of it.{nl}After you found the Flechette I did my fair share of research on it.{nl}
column3: 플레세트를 되찾는데 시간이 오래 걸리긴 했지만, 바로 자네 덕분에 지금은 내가 지니게 되었소.{nl}자네가 플레세트를 찾아준 후로 연구를 많이 했지.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: And through that research, I found a way to create an arrow as powerful as the Flechette.{nl}
column3: 그런 플레세트의 연구를 통하여, 그 힘에는 미치지 못해도..{nl}그에 못지않은 강력한 화살 제조법을 새로 만드는데 성공했소.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I know there are other people helping the resistance soldiers from the outside.{nl}My Master was apparently an acquaintance of Sênior Ramunas' from the old days.{nl}
column3: 외부에서 저항군을 돕는 분들이 많은 걸로 알고 있습니다.{nl}마스터님도 과거에 라무나스 장로님과 연이 있으셨다고 하시더군요.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I don't know who is helping or how, exactly...{nl}But I assume most of them either worked at the Astral Tower or know someone who did.{nl}
column3: 어느 누가 어떤 식으로 돕고 있는지는 저도 자세히 알진 못하지만..{nl}과거에 별의 탑 출신이었거나 별의 탑과 인연이 있는 분들은 대부분 돕고 있다고 듣긴 했습니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: As you know, the resistance needs soldiers to fight for them, but most of all they need the funds to support themselves.{nl}My guess is that a lot of people are helping with donations.
column3: 저항군의 인원이 부족한 것도 있지만 가장 필요한 건 아마도 저항군을 유지 할 유지비 일테죠.{nl}마족 처치 외에도 아마 보급 물자나 유지비를 지원해 돕고 있을 겁니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: But officially, Ignas is the rightful head of the Astral Tower, and we aren't connected to their organization...{nl}We have no place in the battle between Ignas and the resistance.{nl}
column3: 다만 공식적으로는 이그나스가 별의 탑 단장으로 취임했고 저희는 별의 탑 출신도 아니기 때문에..{nl}저항군에 직접 가담해서 별의 탑 단장인 이그나스와 대적할 수는 없습니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I heard all about what he did from the soldiers, but we just don't have the same responsibility.{nl}All we can do is help indirectly like this.
column3: 저항군을 통해 이그나스에 대한 얘기를 듣긴 했지만 대외적인 명분이 없기 때문이죠.{nl}어쩔 수 없이 이렇게 간접적으로나마 도움을 줄 수밖에 없는 상황입니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Sênior Ramunas
column3: 라무나스 장로

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: You probably already heard the story of how Lydia Schaffen defeated Demon Lord Ziburynas.{nl}The story of Schaffen and her Flechette.{nl}
column3: 과거에 리디아 샤펜님이 마왕 지부리나스를 쓰러트렸다는 얘기는 들어봤겠지?{nl}플레세트라는 강력한 화살로 지부리나스를 쓰러트렸다는 얘기 말일세.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: After Ziburynas was defeated, Schaffen commanded that the demon's essence was kept in the Tower.{nl}Ziburynas' essence was too dangerous. She didn't want it to fall into the hands of another demon.{nl}
column3: 그 뒤에 리디아 샤펜님은 지부리나스의 힘이 담긴 정수를 탑에서 보관하도록 지시했다더군.{nl}강력한 힘을 가진 정수이기 때문에 혹여나 다른 마족의 손에 넘어가면 위험한 상황이 생길 수 있으니 말이야.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: And she made the right decision.{nl}Many demons have tried to attack the Tower, but all of them failed.{nl}
column3: 리디아 샤펜님의 판단은 옳은 판단이었네.{nl}지금껏 셀 수 없을 만큼 많은 마족이 탑을 공격해 왔지만 실패했지.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The rumor went that the Tower was better protected than the royal palace. And that's saying something.{nl}
column3: 대륙의 왕실보다 안전하다는 소문까지 날 정도였으니 말 다한 게 아닌가?{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I saw Ziburynas' essence once when I worked at the Tower.{nl}They used to move it around every now and then to keep it safe.{nl}
column3: 탑에 있을 때 지부리나스의 정수를 우연히 한 번 본 적이 있네.{nl}혹시 모를 일을 대비해 주기적으로 정수를 다른 방으로 옮길 때였지.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: And let me tell you, the energy coming from that essence was evil. Terrifying.{nl}Looking at it felt like falling from an abyss.{nl}
column3: 정수에서 흘러나오는 기운은 굉장히 사악하고 무서웠다네.{nl}바라만 봐도 심연의 나락으로 빠질 것만 같은 기분이 들었지.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I thought the essence would be safe as long as it was kept in the Tower...{nl}Never in my dreams did I think it would be stolen from the inside.{nl}
column3: 탑에서 보관하고 있는 한 안전할 거로 생각했건만..{nl}탑 내부에서 그 정수를 빼돌릴 줄은 꿈에도 몰랐네.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: It was Ignas' fault, of course. He sided with the demons.{nl}The head of the Astral Tower, that is.
column3: 이그나스가 마족과 결탁했으니 이그나스가 저지른 짓이겠지.{nl}별의 탑 단장이라는 자가 말일세.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: We abandoned the Astral Tower so we could take it back from Ignas.{nl}He isn't fit to be head of the Tower.
column3: 우린 별의 탑을 탈환하기 위해 탑을 나왔습니다.{nl}이그나스는 단장이 될 그릇이 아니에요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I head the water point is working again!{nl}That's great news!
column3: 수반이 정상적으로 가동된다는 얘길 들었습니다!{nl}정말 큰일을 해내셨어요!

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I have no doubt Ignas had something to do with the death of the previous leader.{nl}Nothing works anymore ever since he became head of the Tower.
column3: 별의 탑 단장 이그나스는 전 단장님의 죽음에 관여한 게 틀림없습니다.{nl}게다가 이그나스가 단장이 되고 나서부터는..{nl}탑이 제대로 돌아가지 않았지요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: There are even rumors that he's colluding with the demons.{nl}Although not everyone seems to think it's true...
column3: 이그나스가 마족과 결탁했다는 소문까지 돌더군요.{nl}별의 탑에 남아있는 단원들은 그렇게 생각하지 않아 보이지만..

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Now that the water point is working, the demons will have to leave the lake.{nl}Of course, it will be a while before all the water is purified...
column3: 수반이 정상적으로 가동 되니 이제 마족들이 호수를 넘볼 수 없을 겁니다.{nl}호수 전체에 정화된 물이 퍼져가는 데는 시간은 걸리겠지만..

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The Hydra is monster, but not a demon.{nl}Why did it react to the purified water?
column3: 히드라는 마족이 아닌 몬스터입니다.{nl}어째서 정화된 물에 히드라가 반응했을까요?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: When we first abandoned the Tower, the lake was full of demons.{nl}We managed to clear out the area a little now, but I had no idea the situation was this serious.
column3: 처음 탑을 나왔을 때 호수에 마족들이 넘쳐났죠.{nl}지금이야 저희가 어느 정도 처치는 했지만, 탑에 있을 때 이 정도로 심각한 줄은 몰랐습니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I'm glad the water point is working again.{nl}Hopefully we'll be seeing fewer demons around now.
column3: 수반이 재가동 된다니 다행이네요.{nl}마족들의 수도 서서히 줄어들 겁니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The water points were destroyed while we were still working in the Tower.{nl}For all we know, Ignas could very well be behind all of this.
column3: 탑에 있을 때 호수에 퍼져있는 수반 대부분이 파괴되고 있었습니다.{nl}그 배후에 이그나스가 있었을지도 모르겠군요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The other areas have their own Water Facilities.{nl}If we can make all of them work again, the lake will be purified in no time.
column3: 다른 수역에도 수반시설이 있습니다.{nl}그 수반시설도 가동한다면 호수가 빠르게 정화되겠죠.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: All that's left to do now is to take back the Astral Tower.{nl}We're ready to join the commander of Waters 86.
column3: 이제 별의 탑을 탈환하는 일만 남았군요.{nl}86수역에 있는 총사령관님과 합류해야겠습니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Soldado da Resistência
column3: 저항군 병사

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I'm worried for everyone, but especially the soldiers in Waters 86.{nl}They have to fight directly against Ignas' camp; the casualties there are higher than anywhere else.
column3: 이 지역도 문제지만 86수역에 있는 사람들이 더 걱정되는군요.{nl}이그나스 측과 대립 중이다 보니 사상자가 많다고 들었습니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I heard you got the Water Facility to work again.{nl}You don't know how that makes things easier for us.
column3: 계시자님이 수반시설을 정상적으로 가동했다 들었습니다.{nl}정말 어려운 일을 해내셨군요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Be careful when you go to Waters 86.{nl}If they don't know who you are, you could get yourself into trouble.
column3: 86수역으로 가신다면 부디 몸조심하세요.{nl}그 곳은 신원이 불분명하면 위험한 지역입니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Some members of the Astral Tower still haven't taken a side.{nl}My guess is that they're only trying to save themselves.
column3: 별의 탑에 남아있는 단원 중에 중립성향을 가진 자들도 있다더군요.{nl}몸을 사리기 위해 가만히 있는 건지는 모르겠지만요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Commander Kron seems to think Ignas made a deal with the demons.{nl}When you think of everything that's happening, I'd say he's right.
column3: 크론님이 얘기하기로는 이그나스가 마족과 결탁한 게 틀림없다는군요.{nl}전후사정을 따져봤을 때 그 말이 사실인 것 같기도 합니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: On Medzio Diena, this entire region was overturned.{nl}Many roads and buildings were destroyed because of it.
column3: 신수의 날 때 수역의 지형이 뒤바뀌어버렸습니다.{nl}그 여파로 길이나 건물들이 대부분 훼손되었죠.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I hesitated to abandon the Tower at first.{nl}I wasn't ready to stand against the people I considered my peers.
column3: 처음엔 탑을 나오기가 망설여지더군요.{nl}지금까지 동료로 지낸 사람들과 싸워야 한다는 사실이 괴로웠거든요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I heard there are other people supporting us from the outside.{nl}If it wasn't for them... I don't think we'd be able to support ourselves.
column3: 외부에서 저희를 지원하는 분들이 있다고 들었습니다.{nl}그 분들이 없었다면.. 저항군이 지금까지 유지되긴 힘들었겠죠.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: This is a conflict zone between Ignas' army and the resistance.{nl}Please refrain from any unnecessary movements.
column3: 지금 이곳은 저희 저항군 측과 이그나스 측이 대립 중인 지역입니다.{nl}되도록이면 움직임을 삼가 주십시오.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I'm injured. I can't move like this.{nl}I'm going to have to rest for a while.
column3: 상처를 입어 움직일 수가 없습니다.{nl}잠시 쉬어야겠군요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: We abandoned the Tower to make our own resistance army but... we're still outnumbered.{nl}If only we could get the neutral members to cross over to our side...
column3: 탑을 나와 저항세력을 만들었지만.. 인원이 너무 부족한 상황일세.{nl}탑에 남아있는 중립성향을 가진 단원들이 우리 쪽으로 합세하면 좋을려만.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: We sent a few scouts to the Rank Waters region... no news from them yet.{nl}They should be back by now...
column3: 란코 수역으로 정찰을 보낸 단원들이 몇 있는데.. 아직도 소식이 없다네.{nl}지금쯤이면 연락이 와야 할텐데.. 이상하군.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I can't imagine if Lydia Schaffen were alive to see this...{nl}Our own family split into sides, fighting each other.
column3: 리디아 샤펜님이 이 광경을 보면 얼마나 허탈하실까..{nl}형제들이 서로에게 활을 겨누다니 말일세.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Lydia Schaffen's provisions are hidden somewhere in the region.{nl}They could very well be the solution to our problem.
column3: 이 수역에는 리디아 샤펜님의 안배가 숨겨져 있네.{nl}그 안배에 지금의 상황을 타개할 뭔가가 있을지도 모르겠어.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: So it's true. Ignas is on the demons' side.{nl}Did he use their influence to become head of the Tower?
column3: 이그나스가 마족과 결탁한 게 사실이었군.{nl}마족의 힘으로 얻고자 했던게 단장의 자리였나?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Most resistance soldiers are on the front line, fighting against Ignas' army.{nl}To think we all started out as brothers...
column3: 저항군 대부분이 방어 전선에 나가 이그나스 측 사람들과 대치 중입니다.{nl}저들도 한 때는 같은 형제들이었는데..

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Ignas' camp is more numerous than we expected.{nl}If they ever launch a full-scale attack, there's little we can do to stop them.
column3: 생각보다 이그나스 측 사람들이 많습니다.{nl}이그나스 측이 전면전으로 들어온다면 힘들겠군요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Ignas had no consideration for the members working in the Astral Tower.{nl}He lost all credibility as a leader.
column3: 이그나스는 별의 탑에 있는 단원들을 신경 쓰지 않았습니다.{nl}단장으로서의 신뢰를 잃는 건 한순간이죠.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I don't see any more of Ignas' men around.{nl}We should take care of the demons instead.
column3: 이그나스 측 사람들이 더는 보이지 않더군요.{nl}수역에 남아있는 마족들을 마저 처치해야겠습니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I don't know what Lydia Schaffen's provisions are but...{nl}I hope it's something we can use.
column3: 리디아 샤펜님의 안배가 뭔지는 모르겠지만..{nl}저희에게도 도움이 될만한 거였으면 좋겠군요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Ignas' camp has set out a defensive front line.{nl}Something feels very strange about their commander.
column3: 이그나스 측에서 방어 전선까지 올라왔습니다.{nl}특히 지휘관으로 있는 자는 뭔가 꺼림칙한 기운을 가지고 있더군요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I heard about the strange girl before.{nl}Who would have thought she would appear again to recover Schaffen's provisions...?
column3: 신비한 소녀에 대한 얘기는 저도 들은 적이 있습니다.{nl}그 소녀가 나타나 안배를 복원하는 데 도움을 주다니.. 놀랍군요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I always suspected Ignas was involved with the demons.{nl}If that's true, the other members need to know about it.
column3: 이그나스가 마족과 결탁했다는 의심은 쭉 해왔습니다.{nl}그게 사실이라면 탑의 단원들이 이 사실을 알아야 할 텐데요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: All that's left to do now is return to the Tower.{nl}Ignas' side is no longer sending out its members.
column3: 이제 할 일은 별의 탑으로 이동하는 일뿐이군요.{nl}이그나스 측에서도 더는 단원들을 내보내지 않고 있어요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I know one of the scouts that were sent out to Rank Waters.{nl}There's no news about them yet... I just hope they're safe.
column3: 란코 수역으로 정찰을 나간 단원들 중에 제가 아는 분도 있습니다.{nl}아직도 소식이 없다던데.. 무사하기만을 바랄 뿐이네요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: May I know what you're doing here?{nl}You don't look like a soldier... This area is dangerous, you should leave immediately.
column3: 어디서 오신 겁니까?{nl}이 근방 사람은 아닌 것 같은데.. 이 곳은 위험하니 돌아가세요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: What on earth are you doing here?? You need to get out!{nl}This is a war zone, you could get killed out here!
column3: 아니 여길 어떻게 돌아다니는 거죠? 당장 이 수역을 벗어나세요!{nl}이 곳을 함부로 돌아다녔다간 목숨을 잃을 수도 있습니다!

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: You defeated a demon that was disguised as a human?{nl}Wow, that's amazing.
column3: 인간으로 위장한 마족을 처치하셨다면서요?{nl}정말 대단하세요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Can you feel the energy spreading?{nl}I never such an evil energy.
column3: 이 수역에서 퍼져나오는 기운이 느껴지시나요?{nl}이런 사악한 기운은 처음 느껴봅니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I'm going to move on to another region.{nl}Get rid of some more demons there.
column3: 전 다른 수역으로 이동할 겁니다.{nl}다른 수역에는 아직 마족들이 많이 남아있으니깐요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Somewhere in this region is Pbeta, the demon Ignas is siding with.{nl}I still can't understand why he would do such a thing.
column3: 이곳 어딘가에 이그나스와 결탁한 마족 프베타가 있습니다.{nl}이그나스가 무슨생각을 하고 이런 짓을 벌인 것인지 모르겠군요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I'd say Ignas probably gave away Ziburynas' essence to Pbeta.{nl}The man has to be out of his mind to do something like that.
column3: 이그나스가 지부리나스의 정수를 프베타에게 넘겨 준 것 같군.{nl}미치지 않고서야 이런 짓을 벌이진 않았겠지.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I can't help but be amazed at the fact that the Fletcher Master created an arrow like this.{nl}This could really help us defeat Pbeta.
column3: 플레처 마스터님이 보내주신 이 화살 제조법.. 보면 볼수록 대단하네요.{nl}프베타에게 확실히 타격을 입힐 강력한 화살을 만들어 낼 수 있겠어요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I'm glad the arrow was effective.{nl}I think I'll stay here for a little longer and tend to my wounds.{nl}
column3: 화살이 프베타에게 효과가 있어서 다행입니다.{nl}아, 전 몸이 회복될 때까지 이곳에 남아있을 겁니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I wish I could join you, but I need to recover...{nl}I wouldn't be able to enter the Astral Tower anyway...
column3: 함께 움직이고 싶지만, 몸이 아직 회복되지 않았고..{nl}탑으로 들어갈 명분도 없어서 아쉽지만 어쩔 수 없지요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: From what I was told, Ignas was behind the death of the previous head of the Tower.{nl}I don't know if that's true, but those were the rumors.
column3: 들리는 얘기로는 별의 탑 전 단장의 살인사건 배후에 현 단장이 있다더군요.{nl}사실인지 아닌진 모르겠지만, 소문은 그렇게 나 있어요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I'm glad my traps were useful.{nl}If it wasn't for them, we would never be able to track Pbeta.
column3: 제가 만든 함정이 유용하게 쓰였나 보군요.{nl}제 말대로 함정을 설치해 두지 않았으면 프베타를 추적할 수 없었을 거예요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Pbeta must have been carrying part of Ziburynas' essence.{nl}It's good that at least part of it is gone now.
column3: 프베타가 가지고 있던건 지부리나스 정수의 일부분이었나 보네.{nl}그마저도 프베타가 죽으면서 파괴되었으니 다행이야.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The evil energy is spreading throughout the entire region.{nl}If Pbeta is the source of this energy... our job won't be easy.
column3: 수역에 사악한 기운이 흘러나오고 있군요.{nl}프베타가 흘려보내는 거라면.. 상대하기 쉽지 않겠어요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I heard Pbeta is carrying a very powerful source of energy...{nl}We can only hope Voleta's arrow works.
column3: 듣기로 프베타가 강력한 힘을 가졌다던데..{nl}볼레타님이 제작하신 화살이 효과가 있길 바랄 수밖에 없겠군요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Pbeta was hurt by the traps and Voleta's arrow...{nl}It's only a matter of time now before he's defeated!
column3: 볼레타님이 쏜 화살과 도망칠 때 설치해 두었던 함정에 큰 타격을 입었으니..{nl}이제 프베타를 처치하는 건 시간문제입니다!

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: I'm sure the arrow will work.{nl}As long as Pbeta stays in the dark, we have a real chance of getting to him.
column3: 이 화살은 확실히 효과가 있을 겁니다.{nl}프베타가 눈치채지만 않는다면 승산은 있어요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Aghh... I'm sorry, I don't think I can go on like this...{nl}Go, Revelator. Go and defeat Pbeta.
column3: 으윽.. 죄송하지만 지금 당장 움직일 수가 없네요..{nl}계시자님께서 프베타를 꼭 처치해 주세요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: This entire region was overturned on Medzio Diena.{nl}A lot of roads were destroyed because of that.
column3: 신수의 날에 수역의 지형들이 대부분 변형되었습니다.{nl}그 때문에 길도 엉망이 되어버렸죠.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The villages around the lake were all affected by Medzio Diena.{nl}All the members that had family in those villages were so worried.
column3: 호수 주변의 마을들이 신수의 날로 피해를 많이 입었더군요.{nl}마을에 가족들이 있는 단원들은 그 날 걱정을 많이 하더라고요.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: There's a controller device between the two magic circles.{nl}Maybe the controller needs to be operated in a certain way.{nl}
column3: 두 개의 마법진 중간에 하나의 제어 장치가 자리 잡고 있군요.{nl}아마도 제어장치를 이용해 특정한 규칙을 찾아내야 할 것 같습니다.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: Looking at the first magic circles, they seem to have the same color.{nl}
column3: 처음 나타난 마법진들을 살펴보니 서로 같은 색을 가졌더군요.{nl}

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: If we can use the controller to change the color of the magic circles...{nl}How about we try setting them all to different colors?
column3: 제어 장치로 마법진들의 색을 변형시킬 수 있다면..{nl}마법진들을 서로 다른 색으로 만들어 보는건 어떨까요?

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: What you did was remarkable.{nl}I say your talent is impressive, even for a Revelator.
column3: 이곳에서도 대단한 활약을 보여주셨군요.{nl}계시자님의 실력은 매번 예상을 뛰어넘는 것 같습니다.

Selecione o usuário para atualização de: The tombstone contains faint inscriptions and the image of an offering.
Devout heart, lay before you the blue crystal and be blessed.
Devout heart, lay before you the red crystal and be blessed.
Devout heart, lay before you the yellow crystal and be blessed.
Magic Circle
The spheres are beginning to react with the magic circle.
Red Crystal Orb
An unknown energy is slowly emanating from the crystal orb.{nl}Inspect the orb?
Old Pillar
The wandering spheres are beginning to react with the old pillar.
This pillar has a strange kind of energy.
There's an old pillar here.
There doesn't seem to be a reaction.
The spheres shine brighter when they are closer to the pillar.{nl}Inspect the pillar?
Damaged Stone Plate
There's an image engraved on the stone plate.{nl}The full image only becomes visible when all the plates come together.
Damaged Monument
There's a damaged tombstone.
The stone plates are slowly starting to form an image.
It looks like the image of a person moving.{nl}Try a few gestures in front of the tombstone.
There's an image on the tombstone, but because of the holes it's impossible to make out.
The stone plate looks like it fits in the tombstone.{nl}Try it?
Try a few more gestures in front of the tombstone.
Small Firestone
The Firestone is hovering around.
Old Lantern
The Firestone was sucked into the old lantern and began to react.
There's an old lantern.
The Firestones are burning hot.
The Firestone was sucked into the lantern, but there was no reaction.
Oh, it's nice to see you.{nl}If you aren't busy, would you mind giving me a hand?
Alright, I understand.
Would you happen to know about the Onmyoji?{nl}They arrived in our nation around the Kingdom's millenary to assist in the royal court.{nl}
Now it seems the Onmyoji Master is in a bit of a difficult situation.{nl}His country is using his status to make some rather unreasonable demands to our Kingdom.{nl}
The Master's nation was also affected by Medzio Diena, you see...{nl}And according to them, the fact that the disaster started in our capital is reason enough for them to demand material aid.{nl}
Their requests are certainly excessive...{nl}But if you consider all that the Onmyoji have done for the Kingdom and its subjects, it's hard for us to refuse, don't you think?{nl}
I've asked a few acquaintances to help the Onmyoji Master gather relief material for his country.{nl}Fortunately, most of them were glad to cooperate.{nl}
Now, the Onmyoji Master left to visit his home country and announce our assistance, but it seems he'll be returning to the Kingdom a little earlier than expected.{nl}
If you don't mind, would you pay a visit to the supporters and check on their progress?{nl}I'm afraid we need to gather the relief supplies as soon as possible.
That's very kind of you.{nl}I'll hand you a list of the supporters. The list includes details on the location and type of donation of each supporter.
Pay a visit to each of the supporters on the list and take note of their progress.{nl}I'll confirm the supporters that aren't included in the list.
List of Supporters
Uska's list of supporters for the Onmyoji nation.
Klaipeda's Item Merchant{nl}Has agreed to donate clothing articles.
Klaipeda's Item Merchant{nl}Has agreed to donate lumber.
Druid Master Gina Green{nl}Has agreed to donate mushrooms for cultivation.{nl}Location: Fedimian
Druid Master Gina Green{nl}Has agreed to donate grape seeds for cultivation.{nl}Location: Fedimian
Lord of Orsha{nl}Has agreed to provide accommodation for refugees.
Corsair Master{nl}Has agreed to arrange a ship for the transportation of donated goods.{nl}Location: Akmens Ridge
Plague Doctor Master{nl}Has agreed to donate medical supplies.{nl}Location: Istora Ruins
Kedora Alliance - Leopoldas{nl}Has agreed to provide relief funds.{nl}Location: Manahas
Druid Ellie{nl}Has agreed to donate grain and cereals.{nl}Location: Greene Manor
Oh, you're here to check on the supplies for the Onmyoji Master.{nl}
He's returning sooner than expected?{nl}Oh my, what do I do...? I didn't have time to gather all the clothing I need to donate.{nl}
There's no way I can get everything by the time he arrives...{nl}
Would you maybe help me collect some materials?
Oh, thank you!{nl}

I hear there are a lot of Saltisdaughters roaming around the Fortress of the Land in the Extension area, the Roxona Marketplace, Inner Enceinte District and Vedas Plateau.{nl}You should be able to get a good amount of Saltisdaughter Fur from them.{nl}
I'm going to need about 100 Fur Pieces for my donation.{nl}Alright then, good luck!

To make 100 Fur Pieces you're going to need Saltisdaughter Fur.{nl}The monsters usually roam around the Fortress of the Land in the Extension area, the Roxona Marketplace, Inner Enceinte District and Vedas Plateau.
This should be enough to finish my donation.{nl}Thank you so much for your help.{nl}
You can let Uska know that my clothing donation is on schedule.
I'm so glad I can keep my promise and donate a good amount of clothes to the Onmyoji nation.
He's returning sooner than expected?{nl}Oh my, what do I do...? I didn't have time to gather all the lumber I need to donate.{nl}
The wood is arriving from East Siauliai Woods, you see.{nl}But the lumberjacks can't always find the people to transport that much material, not to mention the distance it has to travel.{nl}
There's no way I can get all the lumber by the time the Onmyoji Master arrives...{nl}
If that's alright, would you help me collect the rest of the lumber?
Oh, thank you!{nl}The lumber will be in a pile in East Siauliai Woods.{nl}I would need you to bring back about 150 pieces of Dry Wood.{nl}
Thank you for the help!
The lumber will be in a pile in East Siauliai Woods.{nl}I need you to bring back about 150 pieces of Dry Wood.{nl}
This should be enough, yes.{nl}Thank you so, so much.
You can let Uska know that my lumber donation will be ready in time.
I'm glad you were here to help me gather the wood for my donation.{nl}Thank you.
Oh, did Uska send you?{nl}Yes, I agreed to gather a few mushroom samples for the Onmyoji nation.{nl}
I've been looking everywhere for different mushroom species that can be cultivated...{nl}But most of the mushrooms I found were contaminated.{nl}
There are a few locations I still need to check...{nl}
If it's not asking too much, would you go there and collect a few samples for me?
Thank you, that's very kind of you.{nl}You can look for the mushroom samples in Poslinkis Forest.{nl}
The mushrooms there give off a peculiar blue glow. Look for that and you will find the mushrooms.{nl}
I would need about 15 Mushroom Samples for my donation.{nl}I can check the other locations myself meanwhile.

Please collect about 15 Mushroom Samples from Poslinkis Forest.{nl}The mushrooms there give off a peculiar blue glow, so look for that and you will find the mushrooms.{nl}I can check the other locations myself meanwhile.
You have the Mushroom Samples!{nl}
Let me check that they aren't contaminated.{nl}It'll only be a moment.

I'm not entirely aware of what the situation is like in the Onmyoji nation...{nl}I'm guessing only part of the land will be fit for cultivation at the moment, but I believe these mushroom samples will be useful in the long run.
Uska sent you over to talk to me...?{nl}Oh, right! What was I thinking?{nl}I agreed to help Uska gather relief goods for the Onmyoji nation.{nl}
There's no time to collect the grape seeds I promised...{nl}Not to mention how long it takes to check for contamination.{nl}
I didn't mean to bother you, but would you go and collect the grape seeds for me?{nl}
I heard about your good deed in Greene Manor.{nl}But I need to make sure the seeds aren't contaminated.
I didn't mean to bother you, but would you go and collect the grape seeds for me?{nl}
Thank you, that's very kind of you.{nl}You can collect the seed samples in Greene Manor.{nl}
Look in the mounds near the Avarza Grape Farm and Ziura Junction.{nl}But make sure not to disturb the farmers' grape fields.
I will need about 15 Grape Seed Samples.{nl}
I'll prepare for the contamination tests meanwhile... Thanks again for agreeing to help me.
I will need about 15 Grape Seed Samples from Greene Manor.{nl}Look in the mounds near the Avarza Grape Farm and Ziura Junction.{nl}
I'll prepare for the contamination tests meanwhile... Thanks again for agreeing to help me.
You have the Grape Seed Samples!{nl}

I'm not entirely aware of what the situation is like in the Onmyoji nation...{nl}I'm guessing only part of the land will be fit for cultivation at the moment, but I believe these grape seed samples will be useful in the long run.
Ah, yes, you came to see me about the support for the Onmyoji nation.{nl}
I promised Uska I would provide accommodation for the refugees.{nl}I've arranged a land lot for the camp, and I've also requested the materials for the tents at the Orsha Item Merchant.{nl}
I asked the boy to let me know as soon as the tent materials were ready...{nl}If you can, do confirm with the Item Merchant.
Do confirm whether the tent materials are ready at the Orsha Item Merchant.
Oh boy... we're in trouble.{nl}I was just about to tell Lady Hamondale we're still short on rope.{nl}
Everybody's using rope these days...{nl}It's hard to keep enough of it in stock.{nl}
I'm really sorry to ask you this but... would you help find some rope?
Wow, really? Thanks!{nl}
Do you know the Ducky monsters of Sunset Flag Forest and Khamadon Forest?{nl}You can get some really good leather from them.{nl}
I would need you to make about 100 pieces of Processed Leather with the Ducky Leather.{nl}Alright, then!
The Ducky monsters live in the Sunset Flag Forest and Khamadon Forest.{nl}I need you to get some of their leather and make me 100 pieces of Processed Leather.{nl}
Plant stems make for some really durable rope, but they take so long to collect...{nl}Our best bet is probably leather rope.
Yup, this should be enough!{nl}
You can tell Lady Hamondale the tent materials will be ready in no time!
All I need are the materials, the rest is a piece of cake!
I'm glad to hear everything is ready.{nl}You may tell Uska we'll finish all the preparations in time.
We're still slightly short-handed... but I'll make sure everything goes as planned.
Support for the Onmyoji nation, you're saying?{nl}
Aye. I got a request for it a while back.{nl}I asked around and I found me a captain who can get the goods over to them.{nl}
But I don't know, he isn't lookin' too cheery.{nl}I think he said he lost some sort of brooch, was it?{nl}
But trust me, he's the man ye want.{nl}I'm only tellin' you this because I want to help.{nl}If ye need him, he'll be around Rasvoy Lake.
The ol' bandit will be somewhere around Rasvoy Lake. Couldn't tell ye where, exactly.
Pirate Captain Lowe
You got something to say to me?
Is that so...?{nl}The Corsair Master told you to come see me?{nl}
Well, I got no time to be helping you right now.{nl}I lost something that belongs to my wife.{nl}
I looked all over this darned place...{nl}Those filthy Brown Lapasapes must have stolen it from me.{nl}
But let's say you whack the little mutts and find my wife's brooch.{nl}I'd be a whole lot more interested in helping you out. How's that sound?
Now we're talking. I know the brooch has to be either here in Rasvoy Lake or the Oasseu Memorial.{nl}One of the Brown Lapasapes is gonna be carrying it.{nl}
It's a purple brooch, you can't miss it. You find it, you bring it back, understood?
Just get the Brown Lapasapes in Rasvoy Lake and Oasseu Memorial.{nl}If you see them drop the brooch, you bring it right back to me, got it?{nl}
Remember, it's a purple brooch!
O-ho! That's it, right there! That's the brooch!{nl}I knew it was those Lapasapes, the filthy rats.{nl}
Right, right. You said you needed me to sail a ship, was it?{nl}
A trip like that isn't cheap, you know?{nl}But alright. Since you found me the darned brooch.{nl}
Just let the Corsair Master know, will you?{nl}Not a lot of captains are up this job, you know? I'll do him the favor.
You can let the Corsair Master know I'm sailing the ship.{nl}You're lucky my mood's right again after I got that brooch back.
50 monsters later, the captain's brooch is still nowhere to be found.{nl}But it's still too early to give up. Keep trying.
That's more than 100 monsters now.{nl}But the captain is certain the brooch is with the Brown Lapasapes, so keep trying.
The Brown Lapasapes seem to have turned more violent.{nl}Is it because of the smell of blood?
Found an object that looks like the captain's brooch.{nl}Go back to him and return the brooch.
Ye solved everything with Lowe, did you?{nl}Aye. Tell Uska he's got his captain.
Ho ho. Got the old scallywag chirping again, ready to sail.
Oh, you're here to check on the supplies for the Onmyoji Master.{nl}

I'm almost done preparing all the medical supplies for the donation...{nl}But there is one thing I'm missing.{nl}It's a type of blood circulation supplement I'm trying to produce. Unfortunately I still don't have all the materials for it.{nl}
It's going to take some time for me to gather everything...{nl}Although, if you can find me some Hard Thistles, that would cut it down by quite a lot.{nl}What do you say?
Hard Thistles are found in Barha Forest and Nahash Forest.{nl}I'd like you to bring back about 15 Hard Thistles.{nl}
If you can't find them at first, look for the purple spots.{nl}The thistles in those regions contain a substance that makes them glow in a very characteristic shade of purple.{nl}
I'll gather the rest of the materials meanwhile.
Hard Thistles are found in Barha Forest and Nahash Forest.{nl}I'd like you to bring back about 15 Hard Thistles.{nl}
The thistles in those regions contain a substance that makes them glow in a very characteristic shade of purple, so look out for the purple spots.
Excellent. These are exactly the kind of Hard Thistles I was looking for.{nl}Thank you.{nl}
Revelator, would you mind doing me another favor?{nl}
In my research camp just down the road I have four piles of boxes with medical supplies.{nl}They're all set to be shipped, but I think I have their quantities mixed up.{nl}
While I'm working on the blood circulation supplement, would you go there and check the stock of each supply?
The supply boxes are at my research camp.{nl}Just check the amount of each type of supply in the four box piles.
Did you count all the supplies?
Medical Supplies
Fever Medicine - 1,460{nl}Small Bandages - 2,970
Antiseptic - 1,630{nl}Pain Medication - 2,150
Ointment - 2,470{nl}Antihemorrhagic Drug - 1,390
Large Bandages - 1,850{nl}Bandaids - 2,260
How many doses of fever and pain medication were there in total?
How many doses of antihemorrhagic drug and antiseptic were there in total?
How many doses of ointment and bandaids were there in total?
How many small and large bandages were there in total?
Those numbers are slightly different from what I had noted.{nl}Would you mind checking one more time?
Ah, yes. The numbers seem right.{nl}You can tell Uska I will have all the medical supplies ready for the donation.
I also had time to prepare the blood circulation supplement. Everything is ready to be shipped.
You came to check on how the donation is doing, did you?{nl}
I just talked to headquarters a few days ago.{nl}I'm gonna be in charge of managing the whole fund transfer, you know?{nl}
Everything was sailing smooth, until...{nl}
This piece of cargo got lost somehow on its way to some Alliance executives.{nl}And not just any cargo; Dimensional Stones! You can guess how that went.{nl}
We don't know how it got lost, but now I got to find it and get it delivered ASAP.{nl}So I'd love to help, but you got to give me a hand with this thing first. What do you say?
Alright, I'll hand you the detector.{nl}There ain't much to it. Just go to Grand Yard Mesa and look around with the detector, see if it reacts.{nl}
The Dimensional Stones are going to be inside the sacks buried there, just use the detector and fish them out.{nl}They'll be about 15 Stones in total.{nl}
Don't ask me how a bunch of Dimensional Stones ended up in those sacks. Just get them out.
Get the detector I gave you to Grand Yard Mesa and see if it reacts to any of the sacks there.{nl}I need you to find me the 15 Dimensional Stones.{nl}
I made that detector myself when I was out getting Dimensional Stone samples in Grand Yard Mesa. Worked like a charm, so don't worry.{nl}
I'm afraid there's nothing else I can tell you about what happened to those Dimensional Stones... It's all confidential, you know.
Oh, you got them all out. Good, good.{nl}
Oh, and, um... Let's keep this between you me, hey pal?{nl}I'll make sure to send someone to Uska with the funds today.
You understand why this needs to stay between you and me, right?{nl}Don't worry, I'm sending the funds to Uska in time for the whole thing.
Something nearby is shining.
Oh, you came to check on the donations for the Onmyoji nation.{nl}Yeah, I heard about it from the Master.{nl}
The farmers here are helping us collect grains and cereals, so no issues there... The problem is keeping the food safe.{nl}
Having all these piles of grain around attracts too many bugs.{nl}If it's not too much to ask, would you protect the cereals with some magic?
We store the grain in the Kvie Farm Area. There's around 9 bags of grain there.{nl}The scroll I just gave you is for a spell that keeps the bugs away from the food.{nl}
It's a really useful spell, but there is one downside.{nl}The magic of the scroll isn't that potent, you'll have to apply to the bags of grain one by one.{nl}
Use it only on the bags that are full.{nl}If you go now, you're going to need to apply the spell about 20 times.
There are 9 bags of grain in the Kvie Farm Area.{nl}If you see a bag that's full, use the scroll I gave you to apply the protective magic.{nl}
You're going to need to apply the magic about 20 times for it to work.
Good, you did it!{nl}Uska will be happy to hear we'll have the donations ready in time.
It's all thanks to you, Revelator.{nl}We really appreciate the help.
Is something wrong?

Oh, you only need to pay a visit to the people who are gathering donations for the Onmyoji Master's country and check on their progress.{nl}Don't forget the list I handed you earlier. All the details about the supporters are there.
Ah, glad to hear all the preparations are on schedule.{nl}As it happens, the Onmyoji Master has just arrived in Klaipeda.{nl}You might want to go and have a word with him.
The Onmyoji Master is here in the city of Klaipeda.
Onmyoji Master
You must be the Revelator Mr. Uska spoke to me about.{nl}How nice to finally meet you. My name is Ahiro Seimei, I work in the Kingdom as Onmyoji Master.{nl}
Mr. Uska told me you assisted him in managing the donations. That's very kind of you.{nl}
I have to say, I was worried for the Kingdom after my country began making all those demands.{nl}I'm eternally grateful to Mr. Uska and all our generous supporters.{nl}
The authorities seem content enough with the agreement reached for the donations.{nl}It is a favor I'm looking forward to repay with my service to the Kingdom and its people.{nl}
Do find me again if you're ever interested in knowing more about the Onmyoji.{nl}I'm sure my country won't object, not after all the help you've given us.
Becoming an Onmyoji requires strong concentration and mental power.{nl}These two elements are crucial for anyone looking to commune with the Divine Spirits.{nl}
Many specialists in this field were formally taught in my home country.{nl}Here, too, in the Kingdom, the previous Onmyoji Master founded a special training zone for future Onmyoji students.{nl}
The training zone is located in Sventimas Exile.{nl}Would you like to have a look and begin training there?
Glad to see you again.{nl}The Onmyoji training zone is located in Sventimas Exile. That is where you can begin your instruction.

The board is called a Shikiban. Originally it is used for divination, but this one was developed especially to train new Onmyoji.{nl}If you take it to the training zone in Sventimas Exile, the Shikiban will reveal an area surrounded by a magic barrier.{nl}
Inside the barrier, each of the paper dolls is moving in a certain direction.{nl}Use the Shikiban to control the trajectory of the dolls and cause them to collide with one another.{nl}
Each time you use the Shikiban on a paper doll, its direction will change 90 degrees counterclockwise.{nl}Observe the dolls closely before using the board.
Controlling the paper dolls may not be easy, but you must be willing to persevere.
Congratulations, you are closer to the limits of your potential.{nl}But I beg you. Do not think lightly of the task that is communing with the Divine Spirits.
One's concentration and mental power must, too, be honed in moderation.{nl}You may want to take some time and rest before resuming your training.
The harmony of Yin and Yang was broken on Medzio Diena.{nl}After the disaster, I came to realize once again the great role of the goddesses in maintaining the natural balance.{nl}

My home country was also very much affected by the aftermath of Medzio Diena, but I believe the answer is here in the Kingdom.{nl}I pray every day that the people and Divine Spirits of my motherland can persist through these dark days.
The true power of the Onmyoji will only manifest itself when Yin and Yang become one.
Fortunately, the mushroom samples you collected were not contaminated.{nl}
Please let Uska know that I'll be delivering the samples myself.{nl}And thank you for all the help.
Fortunately, the grape seed samples you collected were not contaminated.{nl}

In a hidden alley of Fedimian, an old man expired his last breath under Rexipher's deadly grip. The demon threw the man's body on the ground and let out a sigh.{nl}He knew killing a human with his own hands was worth nothing, and that frustrated Rexipher more than anything.{nl}

Decades had passed since Gesti, his superior, first assigned him the task where he was yet to succeed.{nl}All he had achieved was the daily experience of just how meticulously King Zachariel's mausoleum had been constructed. For years he poured his efforts into infiltrating the mausoleum by force, to no avail. It was only recently that Rexipher had begun to consider other methods.

He had decided to swallow his pride and use the humans.{nl}Zachariel, the owner of the mausoleum, was no longer alive, but he could still target those who helped build it. And so, Rexipher began to wander the Kingdom in search of clues from any human involved in the construction of the mausoleum.{nl}Destiny would have it that even those efforts would be in vain. Nothing had escaped King Zachariel's plans.

There was a chance it had all been in Laima's prophecy.{nl}As hard as he looked, there wasn't a single document, blueprint or construction plan left in the Kingdom. No human who had worked on the mausoleum had any recollection of it.{nl}All he found was that King Zachariel had hired the most talented wizards of the time to erase their memories through magic not even a demon lord like himself could undo.{nl}

If only he had chased after those humans before the decades had passed, before time took so many of their short lives, there was a slight chance he would have gotten the advantage over Zachariel. Now, Rexipher could do nothing but regret the years spent attempting to force his way into the mausoleum.
During his ventures in the Kingdom, Rexipher often followed groups of thieves and grave robbers, at times adopting a human form to employ them.

That, of course, was as fruitless as any other of his schemes.{nl}King Zachariel's mausoleum had been built to keep out both demons and ordinary thieves alike.{nl}The structure was impossibly sealed and seemed forever inaccessible.
Rexipher found it hard to believe it had been planned by a human at all.{nl}But he wasn't ready to give up. The fear of Gesti's ire and the refusal to be outsmarted by a mortal kept him going.

He was just about to return to the mausoleum after his trip to Fedimian, where he had gone to gather more information.{nl}He looked around before preparing to teleport to his destination. Teleportation was not unheard of to wizards and other magic users in the Kingdom, but in his human form Rexipher preferred not to call too much attention to himself.{nl}

Then, he noticed someone looking at him; a man was walking in his direction. Oddly, he didn't seem bothered by the body lying motionless at Rexipher's feet.{nl}He stopped in front of the demon and greeted him courteously. [Pleased to meet you.]{nl}Rexipher noticed the man hadn't used the typical human 'Hello' and wondered whether there was more to him than what his common appearance let on. He skipped the introductions. [You know a lot for a human, don't you?]

The man replied.{nl}[My name is Rirumras Jonas. Our Great King committed to my family an official order regarding individuals – human or otherwise – such as yourself. I am here to honor His Majesty's royal order.]{nl}Taken aback by the man's response, Rexipher couldn't help but ask.{nl}[What are you talking about?]

[The King invested great efforts to ensure that his eternal mausoleum would remain secure without the need for a keeper. As far as we know, the mausoleum contains an object that will be extremely important in the future. No one knows when it will be needed: it could be in a thousand, even two thousand years.{nl}Because of this, the mausoleum's facilities were designed to remain dormant until the time when that important object becomes necessary.{nl}Therefore, one would be required to wait until the mausoleum becomes accessible. Of course, some devices in the mausoleum can be activated from the outside, but they cannot be shut down again.

Not only that, most members of the court have no knowledge of how to operate said devices. Only a few select families and individuals keep partial information on the system.]{nl}[Why are you telling me this?]

[First, I want to confirm whether you are the kind of person we are required to watch.]{nl}Rexipher replied. [So you want to know if I'm one of those so-called demons.]{nl}[Correct.][I am. I won't try and deny it. Now that it's confirmed, what are you going to do about it?]

[My family is responsible for activating certain devices in the mausoleum in the event of an attempted breach, not only by human thieves but especially by a demon such as yourself.{nl}After the devices are activated, the mausoleum will generate a stronger defensive response to demon trespassers.]{nl}[Stronger than what it already is?]{nl}[There's always the chance that the structure may deteriorate with time, but yes.]{nl}[What if I were to kill you here and now?]

[I was fully aware of that possibility when I made the decision to approach you.{nl}Alas, my family will activate the devices even if I am to die. They will withhold action if – and only if – I return to tell them that you were neither a demon, nor a human under demon influence. It is not a question of whether I am alive or not.{nl}I should also warn you that my family will not be deceived by any demon attempting to impersonate me.]{nl}[Of course. Zachariel really did his homework, didn't he?]
{nl}Rexipher and the Royal Mausoleum Vol.2

Jonas continued. [I don't know how long my family may survive, but we and everyone affiliated with us carries their own designated mission. Some of us do what I am doing, some of us keep records, and so on.{nl}However, even if our families become extinct or can no longer serve under His Majesty's command, the mausoleum was designed to resist transgressions for many eras to come.{nl}All we are doing is helping maintain the mausoleum's security in any way we can. You see, the King prepared the mausoleum to withstand a thousand years, but he also made provisions for the event that it was required to remain closed for longer. I, for one, am quite pleased that we're able to fulfill one of our missions in such a short time after the completion of the mausoleum.]

Rexipher followed. [Can I ask you something?]{nl}[Yes, what is it?]{nl}[Why did you come here to tell me that? When you could have confirmed that I was a demon otherwise and activated the mausoleum without saying a word to me.]{nl}[Allow me to explain. You see, there is something I must let you know.]

With that, Jonas pulled out a small piece of paper and offered it to Rexipher.{nl}[Read this. It tells you that His Majesty left deliberate clues around the plateau near the mausoleum. The clues will tell you what you need to know if you're looking to approach the mausoleum.]{nl}The demon focused on the small memo. Jonas continued.

[What do you say? As you can see from these notes, there's a slight chance that the mausoleum can be unlocked. How about you go back and resume what you were doing?]{nl}[What sort of trick is this? Doesn't this put you at a disadvantage? Why would you try and please me?]

Jonas replied. [It's very simple, from what I was told. You, as a demon, have the ability to hold onto the mausoleum for many, many eras to come. That alone will prove to be very meaningful at a future time, though we don't know why or how. Perhaps your powers will be used for a just purpose. In any case, this is a decision you will find hard to avoid.]{nl}It was true. Rexipher had no choice but to follow through with Gesti's orders. He couldn't bear admit to a fellow demon that he had failed to force his way into the tomb of a mere human.{nl}All he could do now was pursue the fate Laima had set out, perpetuated in the actions of the man in front of him and his peers. Rexipher knew this was not Jonas' vision. It had all been planned decades before by Laima Herself and King Zachariel.
